description:
In this course you will learn all about Google Adsense, how to use it and how to generate passive income from your website or blog with Adsense.

This course will walk you through the basics of Adsense and go over more advanced topics as well.

For those not familiar with Google Adsense, it is is an advertising placement service by Google. The program is designed for website publishers who want to display targeted text, video or image advertisements on website pages and earn money when site visitors click the ads.

Google AdSense is a flexible, hassle-free way to earn revenue by showing relevant and engaging ads alongside your online content. You can easily show AdSense ads on your website, blog, videos, apps or games with Adsense.

In this course we start from the beginning, where we help you understand how Adsense works and how to set up an account. It then walks you through the Adsense dashboard and then how to setup ads for your website.

You will then learn how to place limitations on ad content, create different ad units, and use advanced placement strategies and reporting. Plus, with AdSense performance reports, you'll learn how to identify ad trends, increase page views, and better tailor ad content.
title: Smart Passive Income with Google Adsense
